metadata.description:
Own a piece of history by acquiring the first ever NFT backed melody/sample loop pack by Grammy Award Winning music producer Illmind. 

Having established a remarkable career as a music producer and digital sound pack innovator over the last 16 years, producing for Drake, Jay Z, Beyonce, Kendrick Lamar, J Cole, Logic, Future, Travis Scott, Khalid, and even Disney's "Moana" soundtrack & Hamilton by Lin Manuel Miranda, the value of this set of unreleased/original melody compositions is priceless.

This will also be the FIRST EVER NFT backed "melody pack" ever to be sold in the music production sound pack marketplace. History will truly be made with ALORIUM.

Each melody composition in this pack can also be used and manipulated, then released commercially (royalty-free guarantee + contract included in file). Drawing inspiration from various analog synthesizers used in the 70's & 80's, I've created a set of melodies using those same synthesizers that evoke those emotions I was so fondly of listening to, growing up as a child. 

  • Audio stems for each sound set are included!
  • 10 original compositions
  • All sounds are original compositions, entirely created by Illmind
  • Gear used: Emu Proteus 2000, Arp Odyssey, Mini Moog, Fender Rhodes, Korg Micro Preset, Yamaha CS20M, Farifsa Polychrome, Casio FZ-1, Arp Explorer 1.
  • All audio recorded on 1/4" Reel To Reel Tape LYREC PTR-1 aka the "Frida" for warmth
  • Comes in stereo WAV 16/44 formatting (better quality than mp3)
  • Compatible with any DAW (Protools, Reason, Logic, Ableton, Fruity Loops, etc)
  • ROYALTY FREE
  • NFT BACKED
metadata.title: ALORIUM [melody pack] by Illmind
metadata.subtitle: A collection of 10 melody compositions
metadata.name: ALORIUM [melody pack] by Illmind
